definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Cars have to yield to pedestrians at zebra crossings.
sentences.chinese: 汽車須在斑馬線前停下來讓路予行人。

sentences.english: Many pedestrians cross the road recklessly, instead of using crosswalks or underpasses.
sentences.chinese: 許多行人任意穿越馬路，而不走斑馬線或地下道。

sentences.english: They do not give way to old folks or children crossing at the zebra crossing.
sentences.chinese: 而且在斑馬線，十字路口，也從來不給老弱婦孺讓路。

sentences.english: You would find out that thestory Zhongshuge is going to tell is somehow relatedto zebra crossing.
sentences.chinese: 你便知道這次鍾書閣要講的與書的故事和斑馬線有關。

sentences.english: When I got to the zebra crossing, traffic light.
sentences.chinese: 當我到了斑馬線前時，綠燈了。

sentences.english: Reduce your speed as you get to the zebra crossing.
sentences.chinese: 車輛快到斑馬線時要減速。

sentences.english: Cars must also stop at zebra crossings if a pedestrian is waiting.
sentences.chinese: 如果有行人在等待，汽車必須在斑馬線那裏停下來。

sentences.english: Walk on the zebra crossing step by step with rear foot tip against the front foot heel.
sentences.chinese: 每一步都後腳尖頂着前腳跟這樣的走過斑馬線。

sentences.english: All car should stop at the zebra crossing.
sentences.chinese: 所有車輛都要在斑馬線前停下。

definition: to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
to turn/to go around a corner
to run a red light/failing to stop at a red traffic light/(slang) to have sex with a girl while she is menstruating
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
